section.heading: Denial of medical or mental health services for inability to pay prohibited.
section.text: No person shall be denied the services enumerated in §§ 47-2713 to 47-2716 because of his or her inability to pay for those services.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: Sept. 14, 1976, D.C. Law 1-82, title IV, § 404, 23 DCR 2461
